parameters.text:
=Screpe the url below and look market gaps to build a product on.

URL: {{ $json.url }}

parameters.content:
## 🟩 **SECTION 1: Define What to Analyze**

### 🔁 Nodes: `Schedule Trigger` + `Edit Fields`

| 🔧 Node              | Name                          | Purpose                                                                                                                      |
| -------------------- | ----------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ⏰ `Schedule Trigger` | **Trigger: Run Weekly Check** | Starts this automation on a schedule (e.g., every Monday at 9 AM).                                                           |
| 📝 `Edit Fields`     | **Set: Target Topic or URL**  | Manually input the industry, keyword, or trend you want to explore (like *"AI in Healthcare"* or *"Sustainable Packaging"*). |

### 🧠 Beginner Tip:

> This section is where **you control the topic**. You don’t need to write code — just input a keyword, and the system will go fetch all the useful insights for you later.

---

## 🟦 **SECTION 2: Discover Market Gaps with AI Agent**

### 🧠 Node: `AI Agent`

Sub-nodes: `OpenAI Chat Model`, `MCP Client (Bright Data)`, `Structured Output Parser`

| 🤖 Node                       | Name                             | Purpose                                                                                              |
| ----------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 🧠 `AI Agent`                 | **AI Agent: Analyze Market Gap** | Main node that coordinates the scraping and insight generation.                                      |
| 🌐 `MCP Client`               | **Bright Data: Scraper Agent**   | Scrapes websites like Statista, Reddit, G2, etc., to find pain points, trends, and missing products. |
| 🧠 `OpenAI Chat Model`        | **LLM: Insight Generator**       | Summarizes scraped data and identifies potential product opportunities using GPT.                    |
| 🧾 `Structured Output Parser` | **Parser: JSON Output Builder**  | Converts messy AI output into clean, structured JSON (with product names and descriptions).          |

### 🧠 Beginner Tip:

> This is the **brain** of the workflow. It does the heavy lifting — finding real problems from real users, and then generating SaaS product ideas you can build. You don’t need to write the ideas — the AI will suggest them based on actual market gaps.

---

## 🟨 **SECTION 3: Break Into Pieces & Save to Google Sheets**

### 🔧 Nodes: `Code` + `Google Sheets`

| ⚙️ Node            | Name                              | Purpose                                                                                                        |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 🧩 `Code`          | **Code: Split Opportunities**     | Takes the structured list of SaaS ideas and splits it into individual items (so they can be saved one by one). |
| 📄 `Google Sheets` | **Google Sheets: Log SaaS Ideas** | Automatically saves each product idea (name + description) into your connected spreadsheet.                    |

### 🧠 Beginner Tip:

> This is where all your hard work **gets stored**. Every week, your sheet grows with new SaaS ideas automatically — perfect for product research, newsletters, or startup launches.

---

## I’ll receive a tiny commission if you join Bright Data through this link—thanks for fueling more free content!

### https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## 🌟 **Workflow: Market Gaps → SaaS Product Ideas → Google Sheet**

This n8n automation scrapes industry insights and converts them into real SaaS product ideas using AI — and then logs them in Google Sheets. It's fully automated, smart, and scalable.

---

## 🟩 **SECTION 1: Define What to Analyze**

### 🔁 Nodes: `Schedule Trigger` + `Edit Fields`

| 🔧 Node              | Name                          | Purpose                                                                                                                      |
| -------------------- | ----------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ⏰ `Schedule Trigger` | **Trigger: Run Weekly Check** | Starts this automation on a schedule (e.g., every Monday at 9 AM).                                                           |
| 📝 `Edit Fields`     | **Set: Target Topic or URL**  | Manually input the industry, keyword, or trend you want to explore (like *"AI in Healthcare"* or *"Sustainable Packaging"*). |

### 🧠 Beginner Tip:

> This section is where **you control the topic**. You don’t need to write code — just input a keyword, and the system will go fetch all the useful insights for you later.

---

## 🟦 **SECTION 2: Discover Market Gaps with AI Agent**

### 🧠 Node: `AI Agent`

Sub-nodes: `OpenAI Chat Model`, `MCP Client (Bright Data)`, `Structured Output Parser`

| 🤖 Node                       | Name                             | Purpose                                                                                              |
| ----------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 🧠 `AI Agent`                 | **AI Agent: Analyze Market Gap** | Main node that coordinates the scraping and insight generation.                                      |
| 🌐 `MCP Client`               | **Bright Data: Scraper Agent**   | Scrapes websites like Statista, Reddit, G2, etc., to find pain points, trends, and missing products. |
| 🧠 `OpenAI Chat Model`        | **LLM: Insight Generator**       | Summarizes scraped data and identifies potential product opportunities using GPT.                    |
| 🧾 `Structured Output Parser` | **Parser: JSON Output Builder**  | Converts messy AI output into clean, structured JSON (with product names and descriptions).          |

### 🧠 Beginner Tip:

> This is the **brain** of the workflow. It does the heavy lifting — finding real problems from real users, and then generating SaaS product ideas you can build. You don’t need to write the ideas — the AI will suggest them based on actual market gaps.

---

## 🟨 **SECTION 3: Break Into Pieces & Save to Google Sheets**

### 🔧 Nodes: `Code` + `Google Sheets`

| ⚙️ Node            | Name                              | Purpose                                                                                                        |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 🧩 `Code`          | **Code: Split Opportunities**     | Takes the structured list of SaaS ideas and splits it into individual items (so they can be saved one by one). |
| 📄 `Google Sheets` | **Google Sheets: Log SaaS Ideas** | Automatically saves each product idea (name + description) into your connected spreadsheet.                    |

### 🧠 Beginner Tip:

> This is where all your hard work **gets stored**. Every week, your sheet grows with new SaaS ideas automatically — perfect for product research, newsletters, or startup launches.

---

## ✅ **End Result**

At the end of the workflow:

* You get a list of *validated SaaS product ideas*.
* Based on real-world gaps found in forums, review sites, and industry reports.
* Neatly logged into Google Sheets without touching code.

---

### 💡 Bonus Ideas to Extend This:

* 📧 **Send a weekly summary email** using the Email node.
* 🔔 **Post ideas to Telegram or Slack** automatically.
* 🧠 **Send ideas to Airtable or Notion** for team-wide collaboration.

---

_metadata.name: Generate SaaS Product Ideas from Market Gaps with OpenAI and Bright Data
